title: Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 7
description:
Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 7:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Bollas & Sundelson - The New Informants; the Betrayal of Confidentiality in Psychoanalysis and Psychotherapy (1995)

-  Breger - A Dream of Undying Fame; How Freud Betrayed His Mentor and Invented Psychoanalysis (2009)

-  Burstow - Psychiatry and Business of Madness; an Ethical and Epistemological Accounting (2015)

-  Colace - Children's Dreams; From Freud's Observations to Modern Dream Research (2010)

-  Dalrymple - Admirable Evasions; How Psychology Undermines Morality (2015)

-  Erwin - A Final Accounting; Philosophical and Empirical Issues in Freudian Psychology (1996)

-  Frances - Saving Normal; an Insider's Revolt Against Out-of-control Psychiatric Diagnosis, DSM-5, Big Pharma,.. (2013)

-  Gallo - Freud's Mexico; Into the Wilds of Psychoanalysis (2010)

-  Gargiulo - Broken Fathers, Broken Sons; a Psychoanalyst Remembers (2008)

-  Green - Illusions and Disillusions of Psychoanalytic Work (2011)

-  Hall - The Stuff of Dreams; Fantasy, Anxiety and Psychoanalysis (2007)

-  Jones - Religion and Psychology in Transition; Psychoanalysis, Feminism & Theology (1996)

-  Karlsson - Psychoanalysis in a New Light (2010)

-  Lu (Ed.) - Effects of Antidepressants (2012)

-  Mair - Abused by Therapy; How Searching for Childhood Trauma Can Damage Adult Lives (2013)

-  Marcuse - Eros and Civilization; a Philosophical Inquiry into Freud (1956)

-  Mills - Decolonizing Global Mental Health; the Psychiatrization of the Majority World (2014)

-  Moran - The Paradoxical Legacy of Sigmund Freud (2010)

-  Null - The Hidden Side of Psychiatry (1995)

-  Parker - Psychology After Discourse Analysis; Concepts, Methods, Critique (2015)

-  Parker - Psychology After Psychoanalysis; Psychosocial Studies and Beyond (2015)

-  Pedder - Attachment and New Beginnings; Reflections on Psychoanalysis Therapy (2010)

-  Perez-Sanchez - Interview and Indicators in Psychoanalysis and Psychotherapy (2012)

-  Rapley et al (Eds.) - De-Medicalizing Misery; Psychiatry, Psychology and the Human Condition (2011)

-  Ratcliffe - Rethinking Commonsense Psychology; a Critique of Folk Psychology, Theory of Mind and Simulation (2007)

-  Rothstein - Making Freud More Freudian (2010)

-  Schafer - Tragic Knots in Psychoanalysis; New Papers on Psychoanalysis (2009)

-  Sharpe - Coming of Age on Zoloft; How Antidepressants Cheered Us UP, Let Us Down, and Changed Who We Are (2012)

-  Sternberg - Psychologists Defying the Crowd- Stories of Those Who Battled the Establishment and Won (2003)

-  Szasz - Liberation by Oppression, a Comparative Study of Slavery and Psychiatry (2002)

-  Szasz - Suicide Prohibition; the Shame of Medicine (2011)

-  Teo - The Critique of Psychology; From Kant to Postcolonial Theory (2005)

-  Tyson et al - Psychology in Social Context; Issues and Debates (2011)

-  Verhaeghe - Does the Woman Exist; From Freud's Hysteric to Lacan's Feminine (1999)

-  Westerink - A Dark Trace; Sigmund Freud on the Sense of Guilt (2009)
